trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ProcessInputEventHandler> is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ProcessInputEventHandler> é usado com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Process input events enable access to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> staging area, which processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: Habilitar o acesso a eventos de entrada do processo de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> área de preparação, que processa a entrada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] eventos.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.
